Detailed Description

Combo Box style widget for selecting a node.

A button that pops down a menu of currently loaded nodes. Also allows the selection to be set to "None".

Member Function Documentation

DzNodeMenu::aboutToShowMenu (  )  [signal]

Emitted just before the menu is displayed. Connect to this signal to take care of any processing that may need to happen before displaying the menu

Clears the menu of all items and refreshes the list

void DzNodeMenu::updateMenu (  )  [protected, slot]

Updates the menu before it is shown. The current implementation just emits aboutToShowMenu().
